hero.title: DARE Framework
hero.subtitle: Design AI Reliable Engagement Framework
hero.description: A framework for strategic and reliable AI adoption in interface design, UX, motion, and branding.

about.title: About the Framework
about.description: The DARE Framework (Design AI Reliable Engagement Framework) establishes levels of AI adoption in design (0-5), promoting reliable and strategic use of artificial intelligence in UI, UX, motion, and branding processes. Our mission is to promote the ethical and efficient use of AI in design, balancing innovation with human control.

framework.title: Framework Levels
framework.description: Explore the different levels of AI adoption in design, from fully manual to fully automated processes.

manifesto.title: DARE Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: Our core principles for reliable engagement with AI in design

principles.title: Human-centered design
principles.description: AI should augment human capabilities, not replace them. Final control and ethical decisions remain with designers.

principles.title: Accountability and transparency
principles.description: Designers must understand and clearly communicate how and where AI was used in the creative process.

principles.title: Understanding boundaries
principles.description: Each level of the framework has its appropriate uses. Not every project should maximize automation.

principles.title: Ethics and inclusion
principles.description: AI should be used to create more inclusive, accessible, and ethically responsible designs.

principles.title: Continuous learning
principles.description: Designers should constantly develop their skills to work efficiently with AI.

contribute.title: Contribute to the Framework
contribute.description: This is an evolving open-source framework. Your contribution is welcome to enhance and expand this initiative.
guidelines: Propose new levels or refine existing ones
Translate the framework to other languages
